entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @AP Tell him to go ahead and move. It’s not like you will get paid anyway @realDonaldTrump doesn’t pay his bills. So, let Grifty McGrifter con someone else for free. Also, by kowtowing to his demands, you further embolden him and invite #Covid19 to spread even further. Say Pass!!!!
